refnamediv.refpurpose: Rebuild a simulink diagram in Xcos

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: The toolbox is not meant to be called as a function but executed as a script.\nTo run the script simply execute Basis.sce

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The script takes a Matlab Simulink SLX file and extracts the diagram data into a Xcos diagram.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: If you want so see how the script works, use it and select the GQS.slx file
